thread.title: Quaint Boutique Hotel in a great part of the Paris
thread.title_full: Quaint Boutique Hotel in a great part of the Paris - Review of Royal Magda Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: susanw814
title: Quaint Boutique Hotel in a great part of the Paris
text:
Friendly hotel very close to the Arch and Champs with many bistro's within walking distance, metro stop just 1 street away. Breakfast was appreciated each morning as well as an "honor" bar and coffee station for evenings. Rooms are currently being updated, I stayed in 2 different rooms one which was recently painted and wallpapered the other one not but both were very accomodating and clean. Bed was slightly larger in the "updated" room. Street traffic was not an issue as windows were well insulated. Small snacks and drinks in the room for a fee.
A couple of little eateries were across the street and next door otherwise walking was not an issue to some of the best bistro's and restaurants. Neighborhood felt safe and within 1/4 mile to Champs and shopping galore.
Front desk was very friendly and helped with directions, taxi's and anything else I needed. Definatly will stay here again for both business and pleasure.
